## Open-source pH sensor

::: columns
::: {.column width="49%"}
I am currently developing a low-cost, Durafet-based intertidal pH sensor in collaboration with Dr. David Burnett at Portland State University. I presented the first version of our design at OCEANS 2023 Limerick for the Student Poster Competition (and won first place!). The publication for this project can be found <a href="https://ameliaritger.github.io/publications.html">here</a>, and the Github repository for this project can be found <a href="https://github.com/ameliaritger/arduino-ph-sensor" target="_blank">here</a>.

We are currently working on a wireless-enabled, power-optimized version of the sensor. Stay tuned for additional updates and publications!
